root: ^So this is Great Barrier Reef. I guess like Coral Reef, it’s a lot more lively than I would like it to be.
^[You hear a voice heading your direction]
^Oh, gee, I’m so sorry, I didn’t mean too. I’m so sorry.
^Wait a minute. I think I’ve seen you before.
^Yeah, I think I do. You’re Sera, the Starfish. The up and coming idol star rising in popularity.
^Well, it’s always great to meet a fan.
^But I wouldn’t say it’s the best time to meet right now.
^There’s trouble going on in the Great Barrier Reef.
^Well you see, I was about to hold my 2nd concert here, it’s well populated and the scenery is beautiful.
^But when my crew and I were testing the equipment, objects fell from above water and dirtied the entire area.
^Not only that, during the chaos, it seems jellyfish also ended up floating down here, making it dangerous for any Fish Folk to roam around.
^I just wanted to perform and bring smiles for the nice folk here.
^I don’t know about the jellyfish situation, but I can definitely help with the trash problem.
^Anything to hear your songs and bring hope to the other Fish Folk.
^I’ll do what I can for you, your music has helped me in the past.
^I’m looking forward to perform in the Great Barrier Reef, I hope I won’t disappoint.
^I’ll stay here so I don’t get in your way. Just be careful of the jellyfish, I wouldn’t want a fan to get hurt because of me.
